page.title: 07The supernatural/N.St Ives
page.content: There are not very many people who are frightened of ghosts. There is a story that a 17 year old girl haunts a bar every 17th of July at the Golden Lion pub in the town centre opposite the Cromwell statue, but nobody believes it. Some people believe in ghosts and some don't. Most people think ghost stories are good fun and most people think ghosts only appear in stories. People also think that ghosts appear to haunt people and when they haunt people it is to get revenge on them. There doesn't seem to be very many ghost stories around our D-Block. Lots of people are not frightened of ghosts because they have never seen one.Generally not very many people really think there are ghosts in this area!
